sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.rmWorkbenchListFilter</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>rmWorkbenchListFilter</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function rmWorkbenchListFilter(listType, entityId, startDate, endDate, filterStates, excludedPlans, entityType, groupId, member) {
	
	if (gs.nil(entityId))
		return;
	
	var planUsers;
	if (entityType == 'group') {
		if(JSUtil.notNil(member) && member!=='all')
			planUsers = [member];
		else {
			planUsers = rmWorkbenchListFilterHelper.getUserIdFromGroup(entityId);
		}
	} else if (entityType == 'user') {
		planUsers = [entityId];
	} else if(entityType == 'role'){
		if (JSUtil.nil(groupId)) {
		    if (JSUtil.notNil(member) && member !== 'all')
		        planUsers = [member];
		    else {
				planUsers = rmWorkbenchListFilterHelper.getUserIdFromRole(entityId);
		    }
		} else {	
			planUsers = rmWorkbenchListFilterHelper.getUserIdFromGroupRole(groupId,entityId);
		}
	}else {
		// When we add the entityType as resource_plan for all existing places in client side, then add an if condition here
		var gr = new GlideRecord('resource_plan');
		gr.get(entityId);
		if(!gr.isValidRecord())
			return;
		
		var rp = new ResourcePlan(gr);
		planUsers = rp.planUserIds();
	}
	
	var rmQueryHelper = new RMQueryHelper();
	if(listType == 'Plans'){
		var plans = rmQueryHelper.getOverlappingPlans(startDate, endDate, planUsers, filterStates);
		var planIds = [];
		while (plans.next()) {
			planIds.push(plans.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return planIds;
	}else if(listType == 'Allocations'|| listType == 'Available'){ 
		return planUsers;
	}else if(listType == 'requested_allocations'){
		var allocationIds = [];
		var allocations;
		if(entityType == 'resource_plan')
			allocations = rmQueryHelper.getOverlappingRequestedAllocationsForResourcePlan(startDate, endDate, entityId, filterStates);
		else
			allocations = rmQueryHelper.getOverlappingRequestedAllocationsForResource(startDate, endDate, entityId, filterStates, member, entityType, planUsers);
		while(allocations.next()){
			allocationIds.push(allocations.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return allocationIds;
	}
	return;
	
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-07-12 08:15:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>29a514639301020064f572edb67ffbb6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>57</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>rmWorkbenchListFilter</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29a514639301020064f572edb67ffbb6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-19 11:38:58</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
